title: Running
description: Running from the past is hard. Hiding from it is even harder. Falling in love is easy, though, if you let yourself... Elena: Have you ever met someone and just known they would change your life? I have. But it wasn't the way I thought. I was ruined. I was scared. And I ran away. Then I met someone else, Chaz, and he changed everything. How often is it that you get a second chance at love with the right kind of man? I plan to grab hold and never let go this time.Chaz: I don’t do relationship. I love women and they love me, but not for the long-term happily ever after the fairy tales warn you about. That is, until meet her. In an instant, my world was turned upside down and I feel like I’m losing control of myself. But one thing is for sure…It’s so worth it. Disclaimer: This book contains strong language and adult scenarios. It is intended for audiences 17+ years of age. This is a stand-alone novel with no cheating and no cliffhanger, written with an alternating POV.
author: Lea Whitney
